backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing storage, authorization, client/transporter registration, loads, tracking, contact messages, user profiles, and admin-set APK link.
backend/migration.mo: Defines migration logic upgrading client and transporter records by adding default contract details.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/.gitignore: Ignore rules for dependencies, build output, environment files, IDE files, and Capacitor platforms.
frontend/ADMIN_ACCESS.md: Documentation describing the admin route access control flow and related components.
frontend/ANDROID_BUILD.md: Guide for building, signing, and publishing Android APK/AAB files for the app.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app metadata, web output directory, and Android keystore settings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/android/_signing-env.ex: Example environment file defining Android keystore signing variables.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Script that builds a debug APK after checking prerequisites and syncing Capacitor.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Script that builds a signed Android App Bundle for Play Store using provided keystore variables.
Script that builds a signed release APK for distribution outside the Play Store.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup configuring React Query, routing, theming, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSnippetPre: Component rendering ad snippet in an iframe with load/error diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/ads/BottomAd.tsx: Bottom banner ad component that loads settings, supports dismissal, and shows ad preview.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Screen informing users they lack admin permissions with link back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminSignIn: Prompt requiring admin login, storing redirect path and showing login button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a user profile with name and email, using saveProfile hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gatekeeper component that checks auth and admin status, showing loading, sign‑in prompt, or access denied before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with links, regional coverage info, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the main page layout with top navigation, content area, bottom ad, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements responsive top navigation with links, mobile menu, logo, and login button.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadLocati: Displays pickup and drop-off locations with icons when provided.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Provides ad configuration, default HTML snippet, and helpers to load/save ad settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Combines identity and profile/role queries to expose auth state, loading flags, and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for contact messages, clients, transporters, loads, and APK link operations using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile and role with actor-dependent loading states.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with earth-tone colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the company About page with mission, values, and regional coverage details using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard with tabs for loads, clients, transporters, contacts, ads, and APK link management.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Provides a client registration and profile update form tied to authentication and backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form that saves messages and a section with company contact details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, company overview, action buttons, and testimonials.
frontend/src/pages/LoadBoardPage.tsx: Page for browsing, posting, and viewing a user's loads with form handling, file uploads, and load creation logic.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a list of logistics services and a how‑it‑works section using static content.
frontend/src/pages/TransporterRegistrati: Transporter registration form handling profile data, required document uploads, and saving transporter details.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's route structure using TanStack Router and maps paths to page components.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Utility to convert arrays of objects to CSV and trigger a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architectural notes, and requirements including naming decisions, admin gating, document uploads, payment terms, tracking phases, security practices, and existing feature metadata.
